item.title: GM
item.description: score:46 Chances: General Motors Company beats earnings expectations, reported EPS is $1.24, expectations were $1.12. The car maker had positive news about free cash flow and EV profits. The automaker planned to introduce some plug-in hybrid models as it forecast better-than-expected earnings. Risks: Formula One rejected a proposed Andretti Cadillac entry, which could have impact on General Motors involvement in the sport.
